# kubernetes_manifest (Resource)

Example resource



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `manifests` (List of String) List of manifests to apply

### Optional

- `apply` (String) One of Overwrite, Merge, Never
- `destroy` (String) One of Always, Never
